importantArticles.headline: MONTERREY, Mexico, April 01, 2025--Today, Jaime Muguiro begins his tenure as CEO of Cemex after being appointed to the position by the company’s Board of Directors on February 10. This appointment is part of a planned leadership transition following former CEO Fernando A. Gonzalez’s decision to retire after a successful career at Cemex.
importantArticles.title: Jaime Muguiro Begins Tenure as CEO of Cemex
